data.text: #Caps Get Past Kraken, 4-1 - Caps reach three straight wins for first time this season, defeating Seattle on strength of 25-save effort from Lindgren: https://t.co/GOhKvF8Cl4

urls.title: Caps Get Past Kraken, 4-1
urls.description: Caps reach three straight wins for first time this season, defeating Seattle on strength of 25-save effort from Lindgren

data.text: Ovechkin buries No. 796 with 3.2 seconds left. It's 4-1 nad the #Caps have their first three-game winning streak of the season. Back to the road and WInnipeg tomorrow for game vs. Jets on Sunday.
Eller dials long distance to make it 3-1 with 1:06 left. #CapsKraken
Kuznetsov hops off the bench and draws a hold on Gourde at 11:06 of third. #Caps to the PP with 2-1 lead. #CapsKraken
Strome off for slashing at 7:49 of third. #Caps with a second PK mission in short succession, still holding that 2-1 lead. #CapsKraken
Milano goes over the window at 2:22 of 3rd. Leading 2-1, #Caps to the PK for first time tonight. #CapsKraken

Larsson off for tripping Dowd with about 3 seconds left in 2nd. #Caps lead 2-1 after two, as they did eight nights ago in Seattle. They'll be trying to author a better outcome tonight, and will open 3rd with 1:57 of PP time. #CapsKraken
#Caps have now notched a PPG in eight of last nine games.
#Caps get one off the rush on the PP, Milano setting up Johansson to make it 2-1. They still have 93 seconds worth of extra man time with which to work. #CapsKraken

Olekisak comes up high on Alexeyev, drops him. It's a five-minute major as of now, but they're taking another look to be sure. And the review is a match penalty for an illegal check to the head. #Caps to a 5-minute all you can eat PP at 9:48 of 2nd in 1-1 game. #CapsKraken

Mantha gets the goal, which is fitting because he has been robbed on great chances on more than a few occasions this season. Irwin picks up his first point of season and Alexeyev notches first point of his NHL career on #Caps' first goal of game.
Looks like it will be Eller's goal, or maybe even Mantha's. But Irwin kept puck in adroitly earlier in the shift and got it through for the favorable bounce. #CapsKraken
Irwin's shot from right point clanks off some boots and goes in to tie it up a1-1, 5:20 into the second. #CapsKraken
Caps turned in a strong first period, but they go to the room down 1-0 after 20. #CapsKraken
Kraken scores first, winning an o-zone draw and going up 1-0 on a Larsson left point shot thru traffic. Might have been deflected. #CapsKraken

#Caps' lines vs. SEA:
8-Ovechkin, 17-Strome, 73-Sheary
15-Milano, 92-Kuznetsov, 77-Oshie 
90-Johansson, 20-Eller, 39-Mantha
59-Protas, 26-Dowd, 21-Hathaway

56-Gustafsson, 74-Carlson
57-van Riemsdyk, 3-Jensen
27-Alexeyev, 52-Irwin

Lindgren vs. Grubauer. #CapsKraken

data.text: #Caps Finish With Flourish in Philly - Caps head home from longest trip of season with consecutive wins, Ovechkin creeps closer to 800 and to Gretzky's mark: https://t.co/eRkcErzfee

urls.title: Caps Finish With Flourish in Philly
urls.description: Caps head home from longest trip of season with consecutive wins, Ovechkin creeps closer to 800 and to Gretzky's mark

data.text: Ovechkin with a second ENG in the waning seconds and it’s a 4-1 final. Ocho is at 795 now and the #caps will come home with a 3-2-1 mark for the trip, but only long enough to do laundry and host Seattle.
Ovechkin with an ENG with 1:35 left to make it 3-1 #Caps. That’s 794 for the captain. #CapsFlyers
Gustafson for delay of game at 11:01 of third. #Caps to PK, seeking to protect 2-1 lead.
Strome puts #Caps up 2-1 with a deft deflection of a Carlson right point shot at 9:19 of third. Fourth line with a good job of setting the table in then o-zone. #CapsFlyers
#Caps and Flyers are all even at 1-1 after two periods from Philly. The two teams have traded power-play goals, Hayes for Philly in the 1st and Oshie for the Caps in the 2nd. #CapsFlyers
Oshie one-timer from the slot on the PP ties the game at 1-1 at 3:51 of the 2nd. Strome teed him up for second game in a row. #CapsFlyers
#Caps now heading to their fourth power play of the night at 2:21 of 2nd. JVR boxed for tripping Jensen. Caps trail, 1-0. #CapsFlyers
MacEwen boxed for tripping TVR at 19:49 of 1st. #Caps to PP for third time, down 1-0 after 20 minutes of play. They'll open the 2nd with 1:50 worth of power play time. #CapsFlyers
Hayes shot from center point finds puchase behind Lindgren at 15:46 of 1st. The PPG gives Flyers a 1-0 lead. #CapsFlyers
Sheary for hooking at 14:16 of 1st, putting Philly on its second PP of the first frame, right after the TVTO. #CapsFlyers
#Caps to the PP at 11:05 of 1st in a 0-0 game. Seeler for hooking Kuznetsov. #CapsFlyers
Oshie heads off for hooking at 4:19 of the 1st. #Caps to the PK in a 0-0 game. #CapsFlyers

Think I screwed that up, actually. They've got two righties on the second pair and two lefties on the third, as you note, but believe its actually gonna be 27-52 third pair, but as always, we shall see. https://t.co/WHmFuIqkTe

90-Johansson, 20-Eller, 39-Mantha

56-Gustafsson, 74-Carlson
57-van Riemsdyk, 3-Jensen
52-Irwin, 27-Alexeyev

Lindgren vs. Hart. #CapsFlyers

data.text: at Ted’s Bulletin in Ballston and I was having a [crappy] day. And Lou was taking a poop and that song came on in the bathroom, and I kind of just kind of looked up and said, ‘Okay, all right, that’s a good sign. I can clean that up.’” 3/3

Naturally, I asked Dowd if he heard it. He did not. His reply wasn’t conducive to inclusion in the written recap, but it’ll work here: “No, I didn’t. That’s a good [bleeping] sign. I like that. The last time that happened, I was in the bathroom with [son] Louie ... 2/3

Story time. At tonight's WAS-EDM game, Oilers had a band playing snippets of songs at stoppages, and they were excellent. Maybe a shift before Dowd's GWG, band played Paul Simon's "You Can Call Me Al," from his 1986 LP, Graceland. #Caps fans know that's Dowd's goal song. 1/3
#Caps Overcome Adversity and Oilers, 3-2 - Missing eight players from their lineup, Caps rally to tie twice and claim two points on Dowd's third-period goal: https://t.co/rU3cqZ0JcR

urls.title: Caps Overcome Adversity and Oilers, 3-2
urls.description: Missing eight players from their lineup, Caps rally to tie twice and claim two points on Dowd's third-period goal

data.text: #Caps get out of Edmonton with a much-needed 3-2 win. Off to Ohilky for trip finale. #CapsOilers
Protas gets a second breakaway in the third period, turns and feeds late guy Nic Dowd, and the latter buries it at 7:13 for a 3-2 #Caps lead, their first of the night. #CapsOilers

#Caps and Oilers are all even at 2-2 after 40. Caps were up a goal after two in Seattle and down a goal ast same juncture in Calgary; got just one point from those two tilts. They need to find a way to squeeze two points out of this one.
Oshie bags a PPG from the bumper spot with two ticks left on the Boucahrd call. It's a 2-2 game with 3:05 left in 2nd. #CapsOilers
Carlson turnover at the line results in a McDavid breakaway goal, shorthanded, at 15:25. #Caps still with 1:32 of PP time, and they now trail 2-1. #CapsOilers
Bouchard boxed for a cross-check on Gustafsson at 14:57 of 2nd in a 1-1 game. #Caps to the PP for third time in a 1-1 game. #CapsOilers
Milano with the solo helper. https://t.co/cOp4BMpFuX

Eller was robbed twice in the first, but he gets one to go here with some slick stickhandling in front, tying the game at 1-1 at 7:25 of 2nd. Would have been a penalty if he hadn't scored, too. #CapsOilers
Barrie is boxed for tripping Mantha at 3:18 of 2nd. Down 1-0, #Caps to PP for second time. #CapsOilers
Oilers go up 1-0 on a Kulak center point drive thru traffic at 1:44 of the 2nd. #CapsOilers
#Caps have been docked another shot at 2nd is about to get underway. As it stands now, they had 22 shots in 1st, tied for their most in a period this season.
And virtually as soon as I Tweeted that about the shot total, the local powers that be have adjusted the #Caps' total down to 23, which is still a single-period high for the season.

#Caps and Oilers are 0-0 after 20 from Rogers Place. Caps with a single-period season high of 24 shots on net in the 1st; they previously had 22 in back-to-back games at Florida and St. Louis, respectively, last month. #CapsOilers
Kuznetsov for tripping at 11:18. #Caps to the PK. #CapsOilers
Nurse goes off for interference on Jensen at 7:01 of 1st. #Caps to the PP in a 0-0 game. #CapsOilers

90-Johansson, 20-Eller, 39-Mantha

57-van Riemsdyk, 3-Jensen
27-Alexeyev, 52-Irwin

data.text: #Caps Fall to Flames, 5-2 - Caps lose game and a pair of important players on Saturday night in Calgary: https://t.co/1k3nb2Dte0

urls.title: Caps Fall to Flames, 5-2
urls.description: Caps lose game and a pair of important players on Saturday night in Calgary

data.text: Dube ENG will make it a 5-2 final. #Caps fall to 1-2-1 on trip. Off to Edmonton for Monday game with Oilers.
Carlson scores at 4v4 with 1:06 left to make it 4-2.
Mangiapane with his second of the night makes it 4-1 with 5:26 left.
Ruzicka scores on a breakaway with 6:21 left to make 3-1.
Huberdeau to the box for tripping in o-zone at 5:27 of 3rd. Trailing 2-1, #Caps to pp for third time. #CapsFlames
Two key performers out for the remainder of the evening, and with the #Caps down a goal headed to the third. https://t.co/ssYtm7ieu6

#Caps are down 2-1 after 40; a Mangipane goal in the second minute of the 2nd is the difference. Of greater concern at the moment are the respective conditions of Fehervary and Kuemper, neither of whom was on bench at period's end. #CapsFlames
Lindgren entering the game for #Caps with 3:51 left in 2nd. #CapsFlames
Jensen for interference at 12:25 of 2nd. Down 2-1, #Caps to their first PK mission of the night. #CapsFlames
Fehervary down the tunnel after taking a hit from Lucic. #CapsFlames
Flames regain lead at 1:35 of 1st on a Mangiapane shot from low in the right circle. #CapsFlames
#Caps and Flames are 1-1 after 20 minutes of play from Calgary. #CapsFlames
#Caps come up with their own snipe from the right circle, from Sheary on the PP with 33.1 seconds left in the 1st. It's 1-1. #CapsFlames
Dube to the box at 18:27 for roughing in the o-zone. Both Calgary penalties in o-zone, both drawn by Dowd. #CapsFlames
Coleman puts Flames up top 1-0 with a snipe under the bar from right circle at 18:03. #CapsFLames
Kadri off for hi-sticking Dowd at 13:11 of 1st in a 0-0 game. #Caps to game's first PP. #CapsFlames

data.text: As noted last night, #Caps have put crooked number on board in 1st period four times this season, all on road. They've done so in last two games and first two road games, winning only one of the four (1-2-1), because they failed to score after 1st in three of the four.
#Caps Fall to Seattle in OT, 3-2 - Unable to build on an early two-goal lead, Caps take point when Beniers completes Kraken comeback early in overtime: https://t.co/VQOv7cZdTo

urls.title: Caps Fall to Seattle in OT, 3-2
urls.description: Unable to build on an early two-goal lead, Caps take point when Beniers completes Kraken comeback early in overtime

data.text: Beniers wins it for Kraken just seven seconds into OT. Off to Calgary. #CaosKraken
Heading to OT here in Seattle. #Caps with the first two and Kraken with the last two, and it’s 2-2. #CapsKraken
Gourde ties it with 2:27 left. It’s 2-2. #CapsKraken
#Caps to PP with 2-1 lead and 7:45 left.
Leading 2-1 early in third, #Caps to a power play on a clean sheet at :49 of 3rd. Schwartz for hooking Sheary. #CapsKraken
#Caps were up two after one, and their lead is trimmed to one after two, leading the Kraken 2-1 after 40. #CapsKraken
Kraken crashes in on the PP, Schwartz scoring on a membership bounce off the back wall at 13:28. It's a 2-1 game. #CapsKraken
Kuznetsov for hooking at 13:12 of 2nd. Up 2-0, #Caps to their second PK mission of the night. #CapsKraken
Gourde goes off for holding Eller at 4:01 of 2nd. Leading 2-0, #Caps to PP for second time tonight. #CapsKraken
Kraken to the PP at :35 of 2nd. Kuemper for tripping Tanev, and Milano will serve it. Up 2-0, #Caps to the PK. #CapsKraken

#Caps put a crooked number on the board in 1st period fror second straight game, taking a 2-0 lead to room after 20. It's their fourth 1st frame crooked number of season, all four on road. #CapsKraken
Sheary scored the #Caps' second goal while filling in for Oshie in the bumper spot on the PP; Oshie still serving his fighting major. #CapsKraken
#Caps take 2-0 lead on the PP with some sublime puck movement, culminating in a Sheary shot and goal from slot at 14:04. #CapsKraken
Up 1-0, #Caps to the game's first PP at 12:56 of the 1st. Eberle for tripping TVR in the o-zone. #CapsKraken
Oshie and Gourde drop mitts and go at it at 10:39 of the 1st. They'll each sit out for the next five. #CapsKraken
Fehervary with his second goal of the season and the trip at 7:36 of 1st. This one is a left point drive that gives the #Caps a 1-0 lead. #CapsKraken

tweets.text: According to Vogs, Alex Alexeyev will move to right side of third pairing with Matt Irwin (both southpaws). Alexeyev can definitely play the right side, spent significant portion of his KHL season on the right side and played often on the right side in chocolate town. #ALLCAPS https://t.co/2T0VxH8Ou6
@VogsCaps The April 29/30 shows look interesting... https://t.co/WRXuNs6q7k

Naturally, I asked Dowd if he heard it. He did not. His reply wasn’t conducive to inclusion in the written recap, but it’ll work here: “No, I didn’t. That’s a good [bleeping] sign. I like that. The last time that happened, I was in the bathroom with [son] Louie ... 2/3

Story time. At tonight's WAS-EDM game, Oilers had a band playing snippets of songs at stoppages, and they were excellent. Maybe a shift before Dowd's GWG, band played Paul Simon's "You Can Call Me Al," from his 1986 LP, Graceland. #Caps fans know that's Dowd's goal song. 1/3
INJURY UPDATE: #Caps Darcy Kuemper (upper body) and Martin Fehervary (upper body) will not return to tonight’s game and will be re-evaluated tomorrow.
